name: 地理學野外調查
restrict: 允許重複修 ◎課程開放上修
goals: Conducting the analysis of basic geographical data in the field work area, training the data collection, and deepening the basic skills of finding facts.
Conducting field works in the study area, analyzing problems with appropriate geographical concepts, and enhancing advanced ability for solving geographical issues.
syllabus:
Major Topics:

1\. How to design your field work?  (Week 1-2)  
2\. How to set the purposes of your field work?  (Week 3-4)  
3\. How to choose your research sites? Basic principles for research ethics (Week 5-6)  
4\. How to prepare your literature review? (Week 7)  
5\. Field survey technologies (Week 8)  
6\. Spatial information (data) collection and analysis (Week 9-10)  
7\. Field survey practice (1)  (Week 11-12)  
8\. Field survey practice (2)  (Week 13-14)  
9\. Final report and discussion (Week 15-16)
prerequisite: The course can be retaken ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
